messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: temper tantrums
messages.msgSnippet: Janene s and Lexie s trantrums have reduced to rare, although they do have emotional outbursts.  THey aren t tantrums.  I m SO glad Janene is now five. Let s
messages.messageBody:
Janene's and Lexie's trantrums have reduced to rare, although they do
have emotional outbursts. THey aren't tantrums. I'm SO glad Janene is
now five.

Let's not discuss my tantrums, let's just say I'm working on them.

Joylyn

ps, I loved this article, when my girls tantrumed I tried to simply hold
them or be there, if they didn't want me touching. I still do that, or
I try.
